          <title>
            <string language="en">Building blocks of large food molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bausteine der großen Nahrungsmittelmoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modules de grandes molécules de nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Blocos de edifício de moléculas grandes do 
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Blocchetti di costruzione di grandi molecole 
dell'alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομικές μονάδες των μεγάλων μορίων τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bloques de edificio de las moléculas grandes del
alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows some examples of small molecules resulting from the digestion of larger food molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbohydrates</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einige Beispiele der kleinen 
Moleküle, resultierend aus der Verdauung der größeren 
Nahrungsmittelmoleküle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre quelques exemples de 
petites molécules résultant de la digestion de plus grandes 
molécules de nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra alguns exemplos de 
moléculas pequenas resultando da digestão de moléculas maiores do 
alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra alcuni esempi di 
piccole molecole derivando dalla digestione di più grandi molecole 
dell'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μερικά παραδείγματα των 
μικρών μορίων ως αποτέλεσμα της πέψης των μεγαλύτερων μορίων 
τροφίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra algunos ejemplos de 
moléculas pequeñas resultando de la digestión de moléculas más 
grandes del alimento.</string>
          </description>
